expo.name: School Buddy (Alpha) v.1.1.3
expo.description:
First Draft of Project with following screens: 
HomeScreen,
  LoginScreen,
  RegisterScreen,
  ForgotPasswordScreen,
  AuthLoadingScreen,
  Dashboard,
  GetStarted
Classes Screen, ----> Ui with Card View
Courses Screen, ----> Ui with Grid and automated array filling 60 Cards  --UPDATED-- Clickable Cards, open Modal with Course Details --! Bug Fixed ! >> Video Modal Close Button with Margin Top 130 till content is filled 

Library Screen, ----> Ui with Grid and automated array filling 60 Cards 
Chat Screen, ---> implementation of GfitedChat Library and UI of example chat 
HomeScreen --> Basic UI Design  and set as default screen

Schedual Screen --> Agenda View Fixed, Random Events will be created 


Profile Screen --> Avatar and rest of UI done 


DB config to firebase 

User Auth working with FB redirection if not logged in or signed up
Bottom Navigation fixed
----!!! UPDATED DB FUNCTION !!!!------
User now fetching datas from DB (Cloud Firestore) Name, Email are stored into DB after Sign Up 
additional fields are put in manually until next Update 


actual connection to firebase for sign in and sign up or password reset
